title: If your favorite champion was cloned
body:
But has an opposite personality of the real one!?

Mine:
{{champion:161}} SAVE THE ANIMALS. FOR NATURE AND HARMONY *cuddles up all the bunnies to hide from the disintegration ray*

replies.body:
{{champion:45}} I am a good guy, stop laughing
{{champion:17}} gl hf guys lets have so much fun
{{champion:33}} No
{{champion:31}} I'm actually not that hungry
{{champion:4}} *Donates to charity*
{{champion:268}} SHURIMA... can stay where it is.
{{champion:201}} *throws poro to block life form disintegration ray*
{{champion:86}} NOXUS!
{{champion:6}} *is most popular champion ever*
{{champion:154}} *doesn't want a suit*
{{champion:56}} Sleeps with a nightlight...
{{champion:429}} *has a very forgiving personality*

{{champion:10}} becomes {{champion:25}} (and vice versa)
{{champion:90}} becomes {{champion:38}} (and vice versa)
{{champion:22}} becomes {{champion:113}} (and vice versa)

{{champion:254}} always observes proper procedure and only resorts to violence if it's the last option.  She wishes {{champion:51}} would stop shooting suspects before she can negotiate.

{{champion:412}} believes every soul is precious and must be treated well, so he collects them to take them to Paradise.
{{champion:102}} is afraid of fire following a traumatic childhood accident.
{{champion:54}} is now made of Styrofoam.
{{champion:111}} dreams of flying and hates the water.
{{champion:266}} thinks we need to give peace a chance.
{{champion:36}} is a well-respected physician and all-around nice guy who speaks in a very erudite manner.
{{champion:6}} becomes a legendary Noxian sex symbol.  "Eternal life.  Endless pleasure."
{{champion:115}} always makes sure to ask if there are questions before the implosion.
{{champion:127}} thinks the Watchers aren't really that neat and can just stay where they are.
{{champion:133}} hates birds.

{{champion:134}} "I think I have enough power for now."
{{champion:103}} "I am saving myself for marriage."
{{champion:79}} "48 months sober!"
{{champion:12}} "You can milk those if you wish"
{{champion:6}} "Most popular champion for the 36th week in a row? OH YEAH!"
{{champion:67}} "The dark mages are an under privileged people. We should help them."
{{champion:17}} "I think I will show mercy today."
{{champion:30}} "Life is worth living."
{{champion:44}} "Sorry Ezreal, i'm straight."
{{champion:86}} "FOR THE NOXUS!"
{{champion:266}} "Peace is the greatest goal of all"
{{champion:107}} "i'm a vegetarian. You shouldn't kill another animal for any reason!"
{{champion:32}} "I have so many friends!"

> [{quoted}](name=OneMoreDaySK,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jWJqNKn7,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-25T12:54:01.550+0000)
>
> {{champion:37}}  Um... Her Pentakill skin?

Or a CHATTER BOX, LOUD MOUTH WHO LOVES TO TELL EVERYONE WHAT SHE IS THINKING AT EVERY SECOND OF HER LIFE IN A LOUD VOICE.... XD

> [{quoted}](name=LeachimKcorruts,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jWJqNKn7,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-03-25T13:16:57.569+0000)
>
> Or a CHATTER BOX, LOUD MOUTH WHO LOVES TO TELL EVERYONE WHAT SHE IS THINKING AT EVERY SECOND OF HER LIFE IN A LOUD VOICE.... XD

*Personality

Shes still mute

But this made me lol
And is a horrible musician, yet has a good singing voice...
I didn't know that the physical capability to speak was a personality trait.  Huh.
{{champion:26}} forgets things 5 seconds after seeing them happen.

{{champion:36}} Mundo goes where other people please.
{{champion:1}} You smell like... Retardants!
{{champion:119}} Welcome to the league of everyone except Draven. Not Draaaaaven, Draven.
{{champion:82}} I prefer classical.
{{champion:99}} Emo Lux skin is born.
{{champion:96}} Goes on a fast to save food.
{{champion:222}} Her conversations with fishbones because serious conversations.
{{champion:266}} Faints at the sight of blood.

> [{quoted}](name=bananaman313,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jWJqNKn7,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-24T00:02:06.438+0000)

> Mine:
> {{champion:161}} SAVE THE ANIMALS. FOR NATURE AND HARMONY *cuddles up all the bunnies to hide from the disintegration ray*

I think otherwise:
{{champion:161}} *watches FOX*

{{champion:107}}  *You have a warriors heart, I think its a nice trait!*

*You've earned a good death, but I won't let you get hurt!*

*Monsters can be made to smile*
{{champion:7}} Tells the complete truth about everything.
{{champion:79}} : AA Gragas would be an interesting sight.

{{champion:35}}  Let's put a frown? on that face.... wut
"for my next trick I'll make myself disappear"?

I dont really think he would be much different.... Maybe its actually Ronald McDonald?  relevant https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XwXl9MtyWgs
{{champion:76}} did i mention it's a celibate season?
